attributes.action: recognise Wales as it's own Country and not as a "suburb" of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 1536, the Act of Union brought England and Wales together, united into one.  We believe that Wales should have full identity as a sovereign status as the people of Wales were forced into this union by force.

When Wales was brought into the Union it had never had separate sovereign status like Scotland and Ireland

We have our language, our flag and different sense of values that sometimes sets us apart from many other Countries.  

We have been given a Welsh Assembly to keep the masses quiet, but majority of decisions still have to be passed by Westminster.

We appreciate this, but we still would like to be classed as a Country and not a Suburb of England.
